name: Solum Health
headline: AI Automation for Therapy Practices
description:
Turning therapy admin chaos into automated calm‚ÄîVoiceAI for intakes, seamless prior auths, referral and scheduling management.

Built by practice owners, for practice owners (www.getsolum.com).

founders.name: JP Montoya, Founder
founders.description: Building the tool I wish I had when scaling my own practice (20,000 patients). Passionate about simplifying therapy operations with AI Automations.

Simplify your journey to a better practice.
## Transform Your Practice in Three Simple Steps
We guide you step-by-step to partner, integrate your AI assistant, and enhance your practice, streamlining operations and patient care.
[Transform Your Practice Now.](https://www.getsolum.com/<https:/calendly.com/jp-getsolum>)
### STEP 1 : PARTER WITH US
### We work together to revolutionize your practice.
We collaborate to address your practice's needs, integrating Solum Health AI to streamline workflows and prioritize patient care.
### STEP 2 : MEET ANNIE, YOUR AI ASSISTANT
### Your AI, built for therapy practices.
We tailor your AI assistant to manage scheduling, authorizations, and communication, ensuring Annie supports your practice‚Äôs growth efficiently.
### STEP 3 : WATCH THE IMPACT
### Transform your practice from day one.
Annie cuts administrative tasks by 50%, boosting efficiency and patient care while avoiding extra hires.
TESTIMONIALS
## What Our Clients Say
Streamline your workflows with our advanced automation solutions, designed to optimize both operational and administrative processes. Our products reduce manual tasks, enhance communication, and significantly improve overall efficiency within your organization.
‚ÄúSolum has transformed our practice, saving us 30% in operational costs, significantly reducing administrative work, and cutting down our headcount needs.‚Äù‍
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ccf770fcc17846279d79cd/675074155458c403f228ffb1_latinwomansolum.png)
Laura Martinez
ABA Practice Owner
"The automation of reminders and authorizations with Solum has streamlined our operations, reduced our average waiting time for authorizations by more than 14 hours per week, and allowed us to focus more on patient care."‍
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ccf770fcc17846279d79cd/674a910a64a268c25e3d32c3_menprofileusa.png)
John Davis
Speech Therapy Specialist
"With Solum, we have seen a 40% reduction in administrative work time, decreased costs, and a notable reduction in headcount. Their system is intuitive and helps us manage resources more effectively."‍
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ccf770fcc17846279d79cd/6759cd2cb513dc7f6153f77b_asiangorlsolum.png)
Emily Chen
Multi-disciplinary Practice Owner
"Solum Health has transformed our operations, boosting efficiency, reducing manual work, and freeing us to focus on growth. The impact has been incredible!"‍
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ccf770fcc17846279d79cd/674a8ea407f2adb266b0503b_martinayalapic.jpeg)
Martin Ayala
Founder AlwaysKeep Progressing

## Boost Revenue Without Increasing Headcount
Say goodbye to the headaches of hiring, training, and retention. Your AI worker is always ready, working 24/7 to eliminate administrative burdens and streamline operations.
‚è±Ô∏è
### No Downtime
Operates around the clock, ensuring your practice never misses a beat.
üíµ
### Cost-Effective
Archieve more without adding to your payroll. Exponential growth at a cost saving.
üöÄ
### Focus on Growth
Free up your team to focus on improving care, negotiate better rates and increase patient outcomes, while your AI handles the rest.
**Empower your practice to do more, with less.** Let your AI worker transform how you operate.

generated_description:
**Solum Health Overview**

Solum Health, based in San Francisco, is an innovative company aiming to revolutionize therapy practices through AI automation. Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator Batch S22, Solum originated from the desire to transform chaotic therapy administration into streamlined efficiency. Their mission is to introduce AI automation into therapy practices, focused on tasks like voice-assisted patient intakes, prior authorizations, referral management, and scheduling.

### The Core Offering

Solum Health‚Äôs flagship product is an AI front office solution, cleverly named "Annie." This virtual assistant takes the load off administrative tasks, allowing therapists and their staff to concentrate on patient care. Here‚Äôs how it works:

- **Voice AI for Communication**: Automates calls so your front desk can focus on essential tasks.
- **Registration and Intake**: Simplifies patient onboarding, ensuring complete and accurate data collection.
- **Prior Authorization & Referrals**: Accelerates the authorization process, improving care timelines.
- **Scheduling Management**: Streamlines bookings, cancellations, and reminders to minimize no-shows.
- **Waitlist Coordination**: Efficiently manages waitlists, notifying patients to fill schedule gaps.

### Why Solum Health?

With a compact team of three and led by Nicolas Dessaigne as their Group Partner, Solum Health is built by practice owners for practice owners. They understand firsthand the complexities of running a therapy practice and have tailored their solutions to meet those specific needs. Their system is designed to:

- **Reduce Admin Work**: Their clients report significant decreases in operational costs and administrative workload.
- **Enhance Patient Care**: By offloading routine tasks to Annie, therapists can devote more time to their patients.
- **Boost Efficiency**: Automation cuts administrative tasks by up to 50%, ensuring practices run smoothly without additional hires.

### Client Success Stories

The response from clients has been overwhelmingly positive. For example, Laura Martinez, an ABA practice owner, noted a 30% reduction in operational costs, while John Davis reported a reduction in waiting times for authorizations, allowing for increased focus on patient care. 

### Future Directions

Solum Health is poised for growth in the B2B healthcare sector, extending its reach and capabilities. Its branding as an AI automation tool not only promises operational mastery but also focuses on empowering health care practices to do more while minimizing unnecessary expenses.

For those looking to bolster their practice through innovative technology, [Solum Health](https://www.getsolum.com/) stands out as a solution that blends operational efficiency with a clear focus on patient outcomes.
